subject: REQ: Problems testing servlets
msgSnippet: Everyone: This is an open invitation to have some questions answered in the upcoming book JUnit Cookbook . If you have tested servlets with JUnit or are
messageBody:
Everyone:

This is an open invitation to have some questions answered in the
upcoming book "JUnit Cookbook". If you have tested servlets with JUnit
or are looking to test servlets with JUnit now, what questions do you
have? What specific problems have you encountered? What would you like
to know?

Please ask!

Take care.

--
J. B. Rainsberger
President, Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
